survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: Welcome!
top right
As the navigator, I see that we are starting at the bottom left of the map. To go to the top right, I need instructions on which way to navigate. Which direction should I go first?
go to the lisand to the right and take a snake path going from right to left to right
Alright, I'll head to the island on the right. On the island, I see a tiger. Should I continue straight or make a turn?
turn left
Got it, I'll turn left. Now I see a small island with a butterfly on it. Should I continue straight or make another turn?
left
Alright, I'll make a left turn. Now I see a big island with a parrot sitting on a tree. Should I continue straight or make a turn?
straight
Understood, I'll continue straight. Now I see an elephant. Should I go left or right?
right
Great, I'll go right. Now I see three rocks leading to a new island. Should I continue straight or make a turn?
right
Okay, I'll go right. Now I see a frog on the island. Should I continue straight or make a turn?
straight
Got it, I'll continue straight. Now I see a crocodile. Should I go left or right?
left
Okay, I'll go left. Now I see the same big island with the elephant again. Should I continue straight or make a turn?
back
Alright, I'll go back. Now I'm back at the big island with the parrot. What should I do next?
right
Alright, I'll go right. Now I see a giraffe. Should I continue straight or make a turn?
back
Okay, I'll go back. Now I'm back at the big island with the parrot. What should I do next?
back
Alright, I'll go back again. Now I'm back at the island with the butterfly. What should I do next?
left
Okay, I'll go left. Now I see the tiger again. What should I do next?
right
Alright, I'll go right. Now I'm back at the starting point. What should I do next?
right
Alright, I'll go right. Now I see a small island with a snake on it. Should I continue straight or make a turn?
left
Okay, I'll make a left turn. Now I see a treasure! *finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
hey
Hello! Are you ready to start the navigation game?
yes
Great! You are currently at the top-right corner of the map, near a white dog. Your first step is to go left (west) towards a wooden bench. Can you see the bench?
yes
That's great! Now, can you describe what you see next to the bench?
animal
Interesting! What kind of animal do you see?
bird
Hmm, I think there might be a little confusion. Let's try again. Next to the wooden bench, you should see a trail. Can you see it?
yes

Perfect! Now, follow the trail and head towards the florist stand. But remember, don't go all the way to the stand. Instead, make a left turn and cross the trail again, heading back towards the white dog. Can you see the dog?
yes
Great job! Just near the white dog, there should be a wooden branch crossing a river. Can you see it?
yes

Excellent! Now, cross over the wooden branch and continue southwards (down the map). You should come across another white dog sitting next to a red and white checkered picnic. Can you spot the picnic?
y4e
That's wonderful! Approach the picnic and walk over the mat. Just beside it, you should see a bowl of berries. Can you see the berries?
yes
Fantastic! Now, continue to the west from the bowl of berries. You will come across another wooden branch that crosses the river. Can you locate the branch?
yes

Great job! Cross over the wooden branch, heading to the north side of the river. Once you're on the other side, avoid touching the green bush. Instead, circle it from the right side until you reach the florist stand. Can you see the stand?
yes
Well done! Now, turn left (west) and walk below the florist stand. You will see a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Can you spot the bridge?
yes
Awesome! Keep walking past the bridge to the west, and just after the bridge, you will see two elderly people sitting on a bench reading newspapers. Can you see the bench and the people?
yes
Great job! Now, take a few steps south, passing between the old people and another wooden branch. You should then reach a green bush next to the end of the wooden branch. Can you locate the bush?

chat.msg: Welcome!
start in the right of cabin

I see a tent at the north of the map. South of the tent, there is a dog sitting next to a fire. To the right of the fire, I see a red mushroom. Should I go further south to the blue car? Or is there a different path you'd like me to take?
take the path left of the blue car
Okay, I'm now moving on the path left of the blue car. As I progress, I see a blue telescope. Should I continue on this path or do I need to make a turn?
turn right
Got it. I'm now turning right from the path left of the blue car. As I make the turn, I see some rocks surrounding a wooden house. Is this the final destination or should I continue further?
go right

Alright, I'm now heading right from the rocks surrounding the wooden house. As I move in this direction, I see a clearing and a beautiful lake. Should I continue in this direction or is there a different path you'd like me to take?
you are at destination
*finished* Great! I have reached the destination. Thank you for guiding me to the right path!

chat.msg: Welcome!
hey
Hello! Welcome to the game. Are you ready to navigate through the map and follow the path together?
yes
Great! Let's get started. Look around you and describe what you see near the group of three palm trees.
a brown dog
Hmm, actually it's a brown puppy. Good observation! Now, facing the brown puppy, turn slightly to the left and describe what you see.
2 rocks
Almost there! Just to clarify, there is a big rock on the left (west) and a small rock on the right (east). Now, let's move forward. Which direction should we go next?
left
Perfect! Now we're heading in the right direction. Keep going left and let me know when you reach the water.
i am at the water
Great job! Now face the water and tell me what you see.
shark
Excellent! You spotted the shark. Now, make a sharp turn to the right and let me know what you see next.
kayak
Great! You found the red kayak. Now, turn 90 degrees to your right (north) and describe what you see next.
red tent
Fantastic! You're making great progress. Now, veer slightly to the left and tell me what you see ahead of you.
rock
Good job! You found a rock. Keep going in that direction and describe what you see next.
trees
Excellent! You've reached a group of trees. Now, please go around the trees and describe what you see on the other side.
nothing
Hmm, let's try again. Go back to the group of trees and this time go to the north-west, between a red tent on your left and a larger speaker on your right. Let me know what you see next.
beach ball
Great! You found a beach ball. Now, go back towards the trees and go around the ball, keeping it on your right side. Once you've done that, tell me what you see ahead.
crab
Awesome! You've reached a large red crab. Now, turn right (west) and continue along the path. Let me know what you encounter next.
shark
Oops! It seems like we took a wrong turn. Let's go back to where you saw the crab. From there, turn to your left and walk straight until you reach the water again. Let me know when you're there.
id ont nkow

No worries! Let's try to retrace our steps. Go back to where you last saw the crab. From there, turn around and face the other way. Walk straight ahead until you reach the water. Let me know once you're there.
ok
Great! Take your time and let me know when you've reached the water.
rocks
Good job! You've reached the water again and you see some rocks. Please make a sharp turn to the right and describe what you see ahead.
oar
Perfect! You found an oar. Now, go towards the oar and continue moving in that direction. Let me know what you encounter next.
sand
Great! You've found the sandy shore. Now, turn right (west) and walk along the shore. Can you describe what you see next?
no
No worries! Let's keep moving. While walking along the shore, you should come across a red object. Can you spot it?
i dont see anything
Hmm, let's try again. Walk along the shore, and this time look for a red object just before the water. It should be below your eye level. Let me know once you see it.
speaker
Great job! You found the larger speaker. Now, go around the speaker and continue walking in the same direction. Let me know what you see next.
shore
Good observation! You're walking along the shore. Keep going in that direction, but this time make a 90-degree turn to your right (north). Let me know what you find as you continue walking.
mountain

Oops! It seems like we took a wrong turn. Let's backtrack a bit. From the speaker, go back to the shore and this time, instead of turning right, continue walking straight. Let me know what you see next.
ball
That's it! You've found the blue-yellow-white ball. Now, continue walking north, passing between the ball and the medium-sized rock. Let me know what you see ahead.
red kayak
Great job! You found the red kayak. Now, turn 90 degrees to your right (north) and walk along the kayak. Let me know what you see next.
idk
No problem! Keep walking along the kayak until you reach a small green bush. Let me know once you've reached the bush.
ok
Great! You've reached the small green bush. Congratulations on completing the path! Well done! Wasn't it exciting to navigate through the map step by step?

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
